nodes.text: Nygreena Clo was a Jedi Knight serving the Jedi Order during the final decades of the Republic Classic era.

Discovered near birth to be Force-sensitive and raised at the Coruscant Jedi Temple, Clo trained at the academy there and learned the ways of the Force. Eventually graduating and studying as a Padawan, Clo passed the Jedi Trials and was recognized as a Jedi Knight by the Jedi High Council.

Just prior to the Clone Wars, Clo was dispatched to Kabal with fellow Knights Ixian Rovieda, Plessus Ghon, and the Padawan Renxis Dielle to end the month-long riots in the capital city of Shoribus. The riots begun due to planet-wide food shortages, and were only ended when the Confederacy of Independent Systems dropped parcels of rations and other food stuff within the city. The riots claimed many lives, including that of Premiere Jan Dovu; holo-footage of several robed bodies were transmitted over the HoloNet and the Jedi High Council confirmed that Clo and the other Jedi were indeed dead.
